comp303.fivehundred.ai
Class RandomPlayingStrategy

java.lang.Object
  comp303.fivehundred.ai.RandomPlayingStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayingStrategy
public class RandomPlayingStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlayingStrategy

Author:
Ioannis Fytilis 260482744 If leading, picks a card at random except a joker if the contract is in no trump. If not leading and the hand contains cards that can follow suit, pick a suit-following card at random. If not leading and the hand does not contain cards that can follow suit, pick a card at random (including trumps, if available).

Method Detail

play

public Card play(Trick pTrick,
                 Hand pHand)
Description copied from interface: IPlayingStrategy
Selects a card to be played by the player. This method should have no side effect, i.e., it should not remove any cards from Hand.

Specified by:
play in interface IPlayingStrategy
Parameters:
pTrick - Cards played so far in the trick. Note that the number of cards in pTrick determines the playing order of the player. For example, if pTrick.size() == 0, the player leads. If pTrick.size() == 1, he plays second, etc.
pHand - The hand of the player to play.
Returns:
One of the cards in pHand. The card must be a legal play, that is, follow suit if possible.
